
.. _api-reference:

API REFERENCE
=============

Spec version 1.0


toaster.sn
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ID: 0
Type: uint32


The unique device serial number.


toaster.heater.temperature
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ID: 1
Type: float
Units: 

The toaster heater temperature.


toaster.relay.relay_state
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ID: 2
Type: bool


The toaster heating relay element state.
